layer.name: Discipline
layer.definition: Do what needs doing, especially when you don't feel like it.

questions.text: My approach to preventive care (checkups, dental, vision) is ...

answers.4: mostly on schedule, occasionally falling behind
answers.5: scheduled and attended — maintenance is easier than repair
answers.2: always on the list, never on the calendar
answers.3: current on some, way behind on others
answers.1: only when something is really wrong

questions.text: When I notice a health issue, I ...
questions.principle: Don't ignore the small problems; they grow

answers.4: usually address it fairly quickly, occasionally delaying
answers.5: address it before it grows — I don't let things fester
answers.2: convince myself it's probably nothing and hope it goes away
answers.3: address some promptly, let others linger
answers.1: ignore it until it's impossible to ignore

questions.text: When I get medical recommendations, I ...

answers.4: mostly follow through, occasionally skipping or forgetting
answers.5: execute them fully — that's the point
answers.2: start following them but quickly fall off
answers.3: follow some but not others — depends on how inconvenient

questions.principle: Systems beat willpower; routine creates results

answers.5: built into my life — they happen automatically
answers.2: maintained for a while, then dropped
answers.3: consistent in some areas, hit or miss in others

answers.4: usually integrated, though occasionally I get tunnel vision
answers.5: holistic — I look for root causes and connections
answers.2: focused on whatever hurts right now
answers.3: sometimes holistic, sometimes just treating what hurts

remediation.advice: What have you been avoiding? That nagging pain, the checkup you've postponed, the issue you pretend isn't there? Jordan Peterson: 'What you most need to find is where you least want to look.' Schedule one appointment this week that you've been putting off.

scripture.text: Is anyone among you sick? Let him call for the elders of the church, and let them pray over him.
